Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Homan/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Northbound 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, Harrison and Homan: due to, street blockage near Homan/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Central Park, Harrison and Homan: due to, street blockage near Homan/Roosevel
